title: How can I reduce mobile data usage?
answer:
l   Connect to a Wi-Fi network if there is one available.

l   Turn off the mobile data connection when you are not using mobile data.

l   When browsing web pages, you can prevent images from loading on the page if you do not need to view them.

In the **Browser** interface, open the options menu, select **Settings > Bandwidth management** and deselect **Load images**.

l   Disable background data syncing if not needed.

Swipe downwards from the status bar to display shortcut switches and then touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150805152440148001.gif) to turn off the auto sync function.

l   Close the apps that you are not using.

Open the list of recently-used apps and close the apps that you are no longer using.

l   Stop apps in the background from accessing the Internet via mobile data.

Go to **Settings** and select **Networked apps**. Then select the apps for which you want to restrict Internet access and turn off the corresponding mobile data switch.
